PLT_HttpClientTask< T > Class Template Reference

The PLT_HttpClientTask class is a templatized version of PLT_HttpClientSocketTask to support arbitrary delegation of HTTP response handling. More...

#include <PltHttpClientTask.h>

Detailed Description

template<class T>
class PLT_HttpClientTask< T >

The PLT_HttpClientTask class is a templatized version of PLT_HttpClientSocketTask to support arbitrary delegation of HTTP response handling.
